defaultRestaurants.name: Panda Express
defaultRestaurants.description: Fast-food chain for Chinese standards, including some health-conscious options.

defaultRestaurants.name: Le Crepe Cafe
defaultRestaurants.description: Now Serving A Full Breakfast Menu Sweet & savory crepes, Acai bowls , coffees, espresso drinks GlutenFree and Vegan Crepes available! waffle, smoothies, sandwiches, pasta.

defaultRestaurants.name: L&L Hawaiian Barbecue
defaultRestaurants.description: Island-themed fast-food chain whose menu features traditional Hawaiian plate lunches.

defaultRestaurants.name: Honolulu Gourmet Foods Cafe
defaultRestaurants.description: Honolulu Gourmet Foods Cafe features healthy, locally grown salads, sandwiches, poke bowls, and grab-and-go items at affordable prices.

defaultRestaurants.name: Da Spot
defaultRestaurants.description: Da Spot Health Foods & Juices offers diverse, healthy and affordable cuisine with a unique take on tasty dishes from around the world. Da Spot specializes in Mediterranean and North African food with vegan and specialty meat options that can be certified halal or kosher.

defaultRestaurants.name: Kamitoku Ramen
defaultRestaurants.description: Kamitoku Ramen specializes in a Tottori-style beef bone ramen.

defaultRestaurants.name: Lasoon
defaultRestaurants.description: Lasoon offers something for everyone with their signature exotic South Indian and Malaysian cuisine.

defaultRestaurants.name: Holoholo Grill
defaultRestaurants.description: Holoholo Grill features healthy locally grown salads, sandwiches, poke bowls and  grab and go items at affordable prices.

defaultRestaurants.name: Ba-Le
defaultRestaurants.description: Pastries, sandwiches, and pre-made salads are some of their quick lunch options. Popular items at Ba-Le include pho, pad thai, and banh mi sandwiches.

defaultRestaurants.name: Dunkin' Donuts
defaultRestaurants.description: Dunkin’ Donuts in Paradise Palms Cafe will keep Hawaii running with high-quality beverage offerings–including freshly-brewed Hot and Iced Coffees–paired perfectly with delicious donuts, bakery good, sandwiches and more.
